column4: unbeatabl: Main concern would be number of partitions you have.
Howdy, I've got a really old pii300 128m ram laptop that I use mostly as a typewriter and network security tool.  Would ubuntu-server be a good choice for that please?
not enough rem for ANY server
It's my personal laptop, not an actual server, more a terminal for them.  But I don't use X or any desktop environment or anything, so I was wondering if ubuntu-server would eb good for that.
